name: Milk Farm
description:
CONTENT WARNING:    suicide

MILK FARM is a socio-political university project at the School of Design of the Mannheim University of Applied Sciences.  It was originally developed within 5 days. (This is the polished version that went through an additional few days of QA and minor finishing touches).

Suicide among dairy farmers is a huge, constantly growing problem, enforced by the economic system of milk and dairy products. 

In Milk Farm the player is challenged by a scripted, repeating process of random and always dropping milk prices. It is, at its core, a miniature simulation of the vicious cycle many dairy farmers across the world find themselves in, that too often leads to the farmers taking their own lives.
